page.title: 06The School Day
page.content: We begin each school day with assembly when the whole school meets in the hall.We have some hymns and prayers and sometimes a story. First thing Monday morning after assembly we have spellings. Then we have Maths up till break. After break,during summer we have swimming. The rest of the lessons we have during the week are;english,history,science,reading,se wing,using the computer,P.E.,games,writing,art and craft. We sometimes use television and do some work about the programme. We do projects as well. We all do some research about things. We have a sports day when everybody takes part in games and races. Sometimes in maths we use calculators but usually we calculate with our brains. We listen to a radio programme called In the News which is about the weeekly news.
